mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, birthday, tel, email, gender, userLevel, height, weight, address, addressDetail, zipcode, r FROM( SELECT id, password, name, birthday, tel, email, gender, userLevel, height, weight, address, addressDetail, zipcode, rownum r FROM (SELECT * FROM jk_user ORDER BY id desc)) WHERE r >= TO_NUMBER(#{start}) AND r <= TO_NUMBER(#{end})
